Package controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
controller.GameController
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
In this class is the combination of the game logic and the interface logic. this class handles the actions of the FXML view.
Version:
7.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javafx.scene.control.Button buttonNextCard
    This is a FXML Button of the gameview that shows the next card of the hand card.

    This is a FXML Button of the gameview that shows the next history node.

    This is a FXML button of the gameview that handle the logic of a skip turn.
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView cardD0
    This is a FXML ImageView of the gameview that is used to create an animation.
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView cardD01
    This is a FXML ImageView of the gameview that contains the logic and the image of the reverse of the card deck.
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView cardD02
    This is a FXML ImageView of the gameview that contains the logic and the images of the card from hand card.
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView cardD03
    This is a FXML ImageView of the gameview that shows the card that the opponent send.
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView cardD04
    This is a FXML ImageView of the gameview that shows the card that the player send.
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView cardD05
    This is a FXML ImageView of the gameview that shows the card that was send in a determined round.
    private int dissableTurn
    this atribute counts all the turns that the player are not going to play due skip or the event of a card.
    private Game game
    game is the singleton, the game is only created once.

    This is a FXML HBox of the gameview that contains cardD02 and the next a previous buttons.

    This is a FXML VBox of the gameview that contains the hand card and the deck.

    This method applies the reduction of players life.
    private void actionSecret​(Secret secret, boolean sender)
    This method sets the characteristics of each type of secret card, it can change life, manÃ¡, add cards and make questions.
    private void actionSpell​(Spell spell, boolean sender)
    This method sets the characteristics of each type of spell card, it can change life, manÃ¡ and block turns.
    private void addCardHandCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    When the cardD01 is clicked and the player has cards on thew deck and the handCard below ten cards, this methods adds a new card to the deck.
    private void blockTurn()
    This method block the turn of one player.
    private void dissableGUI​(boolean setter)
    When the param setter is true, the interface blocks and the player cannot press anything but the History.
    private void doSenalDeck​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    When the mouse is among the deck this method creates an animation that shows how many cards will be discounted also rotates the cardD0 which propose is decoration.
    private void GAMEOVER()
    This method ends the game when one of the playes life is zero, then it creates a small window indicating who is the winner.
    private void handleNextCard​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    When the buttonNextCard button is clicked, this method sets the next card on the circular double linked list and gets the image to display.
    private void handleNextHistory​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    When buttonNextHistory is pressed it gets the next history node and gets the information from it.
    private void handlePreCard​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    When the buttonPreviousCard button is clicked, this method sets the previous card on the circular double linked list and gets the image to display.

    When buttonPreviousHistory is pressed it gets the previous history node and gets the information from it.
    private void handleSend​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    When the mouse is clicked among the handcard, this method verifies if the player can buy the current card, then decreases the cost from the player's manÃ¡, send the information to the opponent, and verify the action of the card.
    private void handleSkipTurn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    When the buttonSkipTurn button is pressed this method increase 25% of the players life and notifies the opponent that the player skip turn.
    private void initialize()
    This method initialize all the game, it creates the hand card, deck, sets life and manÃ¡.
    private void recibeMessage​(UpdateInfo oldInfo)
    This method is a thread, it verifies if the old info still the same or if the opponent send different information.
    private void recibeMessageAux()
    this is an auxiliary method of recibeMessage(oldInfo) which interprets the new information and habilitates the interface again.
    private void revertSenalDeck​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    When the mouse is not among the deck this method eliminates the animation that shows how many cards will be discounted also the one that rotates the cardD0 which propose is decoration.
    private void selectCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    When the mouse is among the hand card this method shows an animation that tells if the manÃ¡ is enough, if not it shows an "X".
    private void unselectCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
    This method unselect the price of the card, the visualization of the manÃ¡ returns back to normal.
    private void updateGUI()
    This method reads the recent information like round, life, manÃ¡ and current player and actualizes it.

  • Method Details

    • doSenalDeck

      private void doSenalDeck​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      When the mouse is among the deck this method creates an animation that shows how many cards will be discounted also rotates the cardD0 which propose is decoration.
      Parameters:
      event - type MouseEvent

    • addCardHandCard

      private void addCardHandCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      When the cardD01 is clicked and the player has cards on thew deck and the handCard below ten cards, this methods adds a new card to the deck.
      Parameters:
      event - type MouseEvent

    • revertSenalDeck

      private void revertSenalDeck​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      When the mouse is not among the deck this method eliminates the animation that shows how many cards will be discounted also the one that rotates the cardD0 which propose is decoration.
      Parameters:
      event - type MouseEvent

    • handlePreCard

      private void handlePreCard​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When the buttonPreviousCard button is clicked, this method sets the previous card on the circular double linked list and gets the image to display.
      Parameters:
      event - type ActionEvent

    • handleNextCard

      private void handleNextCard​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When the buttonNextCard button is clicked, this method sets the next card on the circular double linked list and gets the image to display.
      Parameters:
      event - type ActionEvent

    • unselectCard

      private void unselectCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method unselect the price of the card, the visualization of the manÃ¡ returns back to normal.
      Parameters:
      event - type MouseEvent

    • selectCard

      private void selectCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      When the mouse is among the hand card this method shows an animation that tells if the manÃ¡ is enough, if not it shows an "X".
      Parameters:
      event - MouseEvent

    • handleSend

      private void handleSend​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      When the mouse is clicked among the handcard, this method verifies if the player can buy the current card, then decreases the cost from the player's manÃ¡, send the information to the opponent, and verify the action of the card.
      Parameters:
      event - type MouseEvent

    • handleSkipTurn

      private void handleSkipTurn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When the buttonSkipTurn button is pressed this method increase 25% of the players life and notifies the opponent that the player skip turn. Then disables the interface.
      Parameters:
      event - type ActionEvent

    • handlePreHistory

      private void handlePreHistory​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When buttonPreviousHistory is pressed it gets the previous history node and gets the information from it. Then it updates the GUI with this information.
      Parameters:
      event - type ActionEvent

    • handleNextHistory

      private void handleNextHistory​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When buttonNextHistory is pressed it gets the next history node and gets the information from it. Then it updates the GUI with this information.
      Parameters:
      event - type ActionEvent

    • dissableGUI

      private void dissableGUI​(boolean setter)
      When the param setter is true, the interface blocks and the player cannot press anything but the History. And when it is false, habilitate the GUI.
      Parameters:
      setter - This is boolean who blocks the GUI.

    • recibeMessage

      private void recibeMessage​(UpdateInfo oldInfo)
      This method is a thread, it verifies if the old info still the same or if the opponent send different information.
      Parameters:
      oldInfo - type UpdateInfo. This is the old info saved on the game.

    • recibeMessageAux

      private void recibeMessageAux()
      this is an auxiliary method of recibeMessage(oldInfo) which interprets the new information and habilitates the interface again. Also verifies the action of the card.

    • updateGUI

      private void updateGUI()
      This method reads the recent information like round, life, manÃ¡ and current player and actualizes it.

    • actionCard

      private void actionCard​(java.lang.String code, boolean sender)
      This method receives the code of the current card and a boolean indicating who is the sender. It reads the category of the card and creates the respective card
      Parameters:
      code - String contains the category and the code af the card
      sender - boolean indicating who is the sender

    • actionHenchman

      private void actionHenchman​(Hencheman hencheman, boolean sender)
      This method applies the reduction of players life. It gets the attack of the current card actualize the opponent life. Also it sets the progreesBar of the opponent.
      Parameters:
      hencheman - int it is the code of the card
      sender - boolean indicating who is the sender

    • actionSpell

      private void actionSpell​(Spell spell, boolean sender)
      This method sets the characteristics of each type of spell card, it can change life, manÃ¡ and block turns.
      Parameters:
      spell - Card
      sender - boolean indicating who is the sender

    • actionSecret

      private void actionSecret​(Secret secret, boolean sender)
      This method sets the characteristics of each type of secret card, it can change life, manÃ¡, add cards and make questions.
      Parameters:
      secret - Card
      sender - boolean indicating who is the sender

    • blockTurn

      private void blockTurn()
      This method block the turn of one player.

    • GAMEOVER

      private void GAMEOVER()
      This method ends the game when one of the playes life is zero, then it creates a small window indicating who is the winner.

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      This method initialize all the game, it creates the hand card, deck, sets life and manÃ¡.
